title: Service
description: Generic concept of a Service or Tool

ods:id.description: The unique digital identifier of the object

ods:version.description: The version of the object, each change generates a new version

ods:created.description: The timestamp that the object version was created in DiSSCo

ods:type.description: The FDO type of the object

state.description: The current state of the object

language.description: Indicator for the language the service is written in, using ISO alpha-3/ISO 639-2

description.description: A fitting description about the service

EOSC_serviceId.description: A persistent identifier, a unique reference to the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue in the context of the EOSC Portal.

taxonomicScope.description: The taxonomic scope on which the service acts upon, e.g. the taxonomic level (genus, species, etc.)

quality.description: A quality indicator for the purpose of the service
examples: Service resonates good with identifying Bombus individuals

facilityLocation.description: Location of the facility hosting the service

sourceUrl.description: Link to the source DOI / PID of the virtual collection

websiteUrl.description: Link to the website covering a description of the service

documentationUrl.description: Link to the documentation of the service

paidService.description: Boolean indicating if the service is paid for

usageConditions.description: Full description of the usage conditions tied to the service

funders.description: A recognition towards the funders of the service

logo.description: Link to the icon resource of the funder

sourceUrl.description: Link pointing to the source URL of the software, e.g. the GitHub repository

dependencies.description: Array holding the names of the required dependencies to run the service's software

deprecated.description: Boolean indicating if the software has been deprecated

bugReports.description: Array holding bug reports published by users of the service

description.description: Field holding the complete bug report's contents

associatedMedia.description: Array of image Urls pointing to their respective sources

url.description: Image url pointing to its resource
